command.opsheeps.help.book_received: You have received the OPSheeps help book!
command.opsheeps.help.client: This command can only be executed by a server player.
item.opsheeps.grow_back_description: Instantly give the Clicked Sheep its Wool Back.
item.opsheeps.shear_drops: Shearing an OP Sheep drops %s items.
item.opsheeps.super_dye_description: Whisper its secret to a sheep, and witness the impossible...
opsheeps.help.page1:
§lWelcome to OPSheeps!

Discover advanced features that empower your creativity. OPSheeps blends innovation and fun, offering you a unique gameplay experience.
opsheeps.help.page2:
§lStep 1: Craft the SuperDye

Collect rare ingredients and use your crafting table to create SuperDye – the essential ingredient for unlocking extraordinary transformations.
opsheeps.help.page3:
§lStep 2: Transform Your Sheep

Apply SuperDye to your sheep and watch as they undergo a stunning metamorphosis into vibrant, powerful creatures.
opsheeps.help.page4:
§lStep 3: Wield the Titan Shears

Titan Shears are your ultimate tool for harvesting resources. Use them to gather materials effortlessly and enhance your gear.
opsheeps.help.page5:
§lFinal Tips

Experiment with OPSheeps' features, explore creative possibilities, and collect rare resources. Enjoy your adventure and may your journeys be epic!
